name: Chronicle: RuneScape Legends - Legendary Pack
detailed_description:
Play with the fate of Legends in a battle of wits, strategy and combat where lives are gambled on the turn of your cards. Defeat your challengers, expand and master your deck, earn rewards and customize your Legends as you write and re-write your story in the Chronicle.

The Legendary Pack - a great value way to get all you need to compete at the very highest level!

The Legendary Pack contains;
50 Booster Packs, each containing 5 cards
2,500 Platinum Ingots - premium currency allowing you to buy additional Booster Packs and enter Dungeoneering rounds
2 exclusive Legendary card backs
2,500 Gem Shards, allowing you to craft your own cards

Note: Only one purchase of this DLC pack per account.

short_description:
The Legendary Pack gives you all you need to compete in Chronicle at the highest level. Pack includes;
50 Booster Packs
2,500 Platinum Ingots
2 exclusive Legendary card backs
2,500 Gem Shards
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Spanish*, Polish*, Portuguese-Brazil*, Russian*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 Onwards
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD Athlon 64X2
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 100 series (512 Mb) or Radeon HD 3xxx or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 Onwards
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD FX-6300 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 5xx or ATI Radeon HD 6xxx or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
